headline: Guggenheim cuts PG&E stock rating amid regulatory uncertainty
summary: Investing.com -- Guggenheim downgraded PG&E Corp (NYSE:PCG) to Neutral from Buy given an ongoing regulatory uncertainty in California despite the utility’s strong fundamentals.

content.title: Guggenheim cuts PG&E stock rating amid regulatory uncertainty
content.summary: Investing.com -- Guggenheim downgraded PG&E Corp (NYSE:PCG) to Neutral from Buy given an ongoing regulatory uncertainty in California despite the utility’s strong fundamentals.

headline: Edison 'mispriced for wildfire exposure,' says UBS as it upgrades stock to Buy
summary: Investing.com -- UBS upgraded Edison International (NYSE:EIX) to "Buy" from "Neutral" arguing that the stock is undervalued given its wildfire exposure and the structure of California’s $21 billion wildfire fund. Though brokerage lowered its price target to $65 from $69 citing a greater wildfire discount but maintained a positive long-term outlook.
